sentence.Network_en: These laws allow the security forces to continue to ride roughshod over the human rights of the people.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些法律允许安全部队继续践踏人权。

sentence.Network_en: They abused their power and rode roughshod over the people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们滥用权力欺凌人民.

sentence.Network_en: He rode roughshod over all opposition to his ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他恣意压制所有与他相左的意见.

lj.lj_ly: a manager who rode roughshod over all opposition.
lj.lj_ls: 对所有反对意见不予理睬的经理

entry.tran: 欺凌;为所欲为;横行霸道
entry.def: If you say that someone is riding roughshod over a person or their views, you disapprove of them because they are using their power or authority to do what they want, completely ignoring that person's wishes.

example.ex: These laws allow the security forces to continue to ride roughshod over the human rights of the people.
example.tran: 这些法律允许安全部队继续践踏人权。

means.word_mean: 1. (of a horse) having horseshoes with projecting nails to prevent slipping
2. (of persons or their actions) able or disposed to inflict pain or suffering;
